page.title: 04What the river means to me
page.content: When it is a hot day, I like to go into the water of the Spey to cool down and enjoy a picnic afterwards. Some people go pearl fishing in the Spey. The R.A.F. Outdoor Centre and the Secondary School sometimes take their canoes out onto the river. Years ago, logs used to be floated down the river. The logs were tied together and were collected where the Spey joins the sea. I am really glad the river is beside us. It attracts more tourists to Grantown because of its scenery and fishers come to Grantoiwn because it is so near the Spey. The river is fun to go swimming in on very hot days. At other times it is quiet and peaceful.
